name: Community Factory
tag_list: social, mobile, camera, photo, groups, kawaii, social-networking, decopic, minna-de-kentei, deco, tokyo, shibuya, harajuku, yoyogi, kokoro, matsumoto
overview:
Community Factory Inc. specializes in developing social media and social application for smartphone.

[DECOPIC] (https://www.facebook.com/welovedecopic), Community Factoryâ€™s one of the apps for smartphone, has been downloaded 6 million times in the 6 months since its release, and it is rapidly gaining users mainly in Asian countries. It’s the photo / camera application that allows users to take photos, decorate them with kawaii stamps and frames, apply a filter and share it on a variety of social networking services, including Facebook, Twitter, Sina Weibo, Tencent Weibo, renren, mixi and Ameba Blog. The application is compatible with any iPhone, iPad or iPod Touch running iOS 4.2 or above or any Android device running Android 2.2 or above.

[piqUp] (https://www.facebook.com/piqUp) allows users to organize photos and share them on a variety of social networking services. The application is compatible with any Android device running Android 2.1 or above.

milestones.description: Social application for mixi, Minna de Kentei surpassed 7 million downloads.
milestones.source_description: Minna de Kentei surpassed 7 million downloads

milestones.description: DECOPIC hits 1 million downloads in 25 days after its release. Decopic is available for iPhone and Android.

milestones.description: DECOPIC hits 2 million downloads on Christmas day taking 2 months after its release.
milestones.source_description: Decopic hits 2 million downloads in 2 months.

milestones.description: DECOPIC hits 6 million downloads  in 6 months after its release.
milestones.source_description: Decopic hits 6 million downloads in 6 months.
